headline: AMGEN'S PHASE 2 MARITIDE DATA TO BE PRESENTED AT THE AMERICAN DIABETES ASSOCIATION 85TH SCIENTIFIC SESSIONS
summary: Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) today announced full results from Part 1 of the Phase 2 study for MariTide (maridebart cafraglutide, formerly AMG 133) in patients living with obesity, with and without Type 2 diabetes, will be presented along with new data from the Phase 3 FOURIER study of Repatha® (evolocumab) in cardiovascular disease and the VESALIUS-REAL study of real-world lipid management patterns at the 85th American Diabetes Association (ADA) Scientific Sessions taking place from June 20–23, 2025, in

raw.headline: AMGEN'S PHASE 2 MARITIDE DATA TO BE PRESENTED AT THE AMERICAN DIABETES ASSOCIATION 85TH SCIENTIFIC SESSIONS
